functions.name: format_device_table
functions.description: Format raw OCR text of a fire alarm device table into a clean numbered list, preserving empty address slots if necessary.

raw_text.description: Raw OCR text output from device table.

reading_mode.description: Choose reading order. 'normal' = left to right. 'rotated' = bottom to top (column-wise).

preserve_empty_slots.description: If true, maintains positional integrity by inserting empty slots where rows/columns are blank.
